.. _benchmarks:

Benchmarks
==========

The **MLIPAudit** benchmark suite is organized into three main categories:
General, Small Molecules, and Biomolecules, reflecting the diversity of systems
and scientific questions addressed. Each category contains a curated
set of benchmarks tailored to the unique properties and challenges of its system class.

Check out the page :ref:`tutorial_new_benchmark` to learn how to
implement your own benchmarks.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    General <general/index>
    Small Molecules <small_molecules/index>
    Molecular Liquids <molecular_liquids/index>
    Biomolecules <biomolecules/index>
